titleStmt.title: An additional instruction unto Iosias Berners, Francis Massenden Esqs; Sir William Roberts knight, Iohn Parker, Henry Pit, Matthias Valentine, and Robert Aldworth, Esqs;
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, Thomas Brewster, and by and for Henry Hills,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Wednesday July 6. 1653. Signed: John Thurloe Secr.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
